[i]Vile Act[/i] – When Reese, Atoning Tactician enters, you may cast a card from your hand with mana value 3 or less without paying its mana cost.
[i]Dark Intuition[/i] – Whenever another creature you control dies, surveil 1.
[i]Promote[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if you cast two or more instant or sorcery spells this turn, transform Reese, Violet Assassin.
